title: Rewards?
body:
I just received two rewards form Riot, now i'm not complaining.. just curious as to why? 

Edit: Three gifts, one came a day later.

replies.body:
I got 2 random icons on one of my smurfs, haven't checked my other accounts.

BRB, checking other accounts...

EDIT: 3 icons on my main, 5 on this account and 2 icons on my other smurf.

Based on what they were, it seems like it *may* be related to the fix for notifications that came through on 7.2, I saw a few icons I got a while ago on multiple accounts (That one from the Star Guardian Quiz, That one from the "Minion Sacrifice" mini-game for The Harrowing, and a Beta Client icon).
A free summoner icon is better then a kick in the teeth :D
Yes, but I want a free skin! Lol.
Uh, Bad Santa Veiger and Cursed Revenant Nocturne.

Ever been chat restricted or banned?
What year did you start playing?
Did they come same time, as in one after another, or was there a gap (day or so)?

Answer those and can probably answer your question.

Restricted a million and one times. 
uh, season one I think? or two. 
And all at once except the last one which was the next day.
Likely apart of their delayed end of year gifts then, which have been slowly going out for the past 3 years, stacking for people who are still on the list.
Ah, that is a very good theory.

pretty sure its a bug.

My "rewards from Riot" were simply ward skins and stuff I bought during snowdown.

Plus an icon.
I did get one skin that I bought myself as a "Gift" but the rest I didn't own.
